main event: A 2nd Lt. in the U.S. Air Force Reserve reported seeing a white, stone-like object that moved rapidly and erratically across the sky in Sacramento, California in November 1952 and in Los Angeles, California in May 1953.
interesting points: The object came to an abrupt stop about 1.5 feet above the witness's head and remained stationary for a few moments.
When the object stopped above the witness, a small white cloud surrounded it, as if drawn together by some electrical force.
The witness reported a faint smell of sweet perfume in the air when the object was overhead.
The object slowly ascended and disappeared from view over the course of 3-4 minutes.
The witness had 20/20 vision and training in anti-aircraft observation.
location: Sacramento, California and Los Angeles, California
witnesses: 2nd Lt. in the U.S. Air Force Reserve
